# Mini-ML for Java

Author : Hugo GUERRIER \
Licence : MIT \
Version : 0.1

## Requirements

* Java >= 8
* Apache Ant >= 1.10.4

## How to compile and test

* Compile : `ant build`
* Create a reusable JAR : `ant jar`
* Start all unit tests : `ant test`
* Clean the generated files : `ant clean`
